    2. Known Issues

    3. Support

    Information on supported platforms and GPUs.

    3.1. Platform Support

    Table 1. Platforms supported by Compute Sanitizer API
    Platform Support
    Windows x86_64 Yes
    Linux x86_64 Yes
    MacOSX Yes

    3.2. GPU Support

    Table 2. GPU architectures supported by Compute Sanitizer API
    Architecture Support
    Kepler No
    Maxwell Yes
    Pascal Yes
    Volta Yes
    Turing Yes
